narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Exit briefing conducted with facility representative.
Applicant is ready to be licensed as a Class A breeder.
License fee will be sent from the applicant to:
USDA, APHIS, ANIMAL CARE
920 Main Campus Dr.
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27605
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
